learning_outcomes: Can understand with ease virtually everything heard or read.
Can summarise information from different spoken and written sources, reconstructing arguments and accounts in a coherent presentation.
Can express him/herself spontaneously, very fluently and precisely, differentiating finer shades of meaning even in more complex situations.
language_focus_topics: Complete mastery of all Armenian grammatical structures, including rare, complex, archaic, literary, and dialectal forms, and their stylistic and pragmatic implications.
Sophisticated, flexible, and creative use of syntax for optimal stylistic effect, emphasis, nuance, and rhetorical impact across all genres.
Full command of all moods and their subtle applications in expressing complex hypothetical reasoning, subjective stance, politeness, and emotional coloring.
Nuanced understanding and masterful application of aspectual distinctions and the interplay of tense, aspect, and mood in complex discourse.
Advanced and flexible use of nominalization, participial constructions, and infinitive/gerund clauses for sophisticated, concise, and elegant expression.
Complete and intuitive control over a vast range of discourse markers, conjunctions, and cohesive devices to create highly articulate texts and speech of any genre.
Understanding, appreciation, critical analysis, and creative use of a wide array of rhetorical figures and stylistic devices common in Armenian literature and formal discourse.
Ability to analyze, deconstruct, and explain complex grammatical structures encountered in any authentic Armenian text with expert precision.
vocabulary_topics: Extensive, profound, and dynamic vocabulary approaching that of an educated native Armenian speaker, including low-frequency words, specialized terminology across diverse fields, and neologisms.

Full command of idiomatic language: idioms, proverbs, colloquialisms, cultural sayings, and fixed expressions, with a deep understanding of their origins, evolution, connotations, and appropriate nuanced usage.

Ability to understand, use, and differentiate the finest shades of meaning, connotations, and register for virtually any lexical item, including formal, literary, specialized, historical, and archaic vocabulary.
Mastery of word formation processes, including understanding of historical linguistic influences, to interpret and creatively use complex words.
Vocabulary for discussing any abstract, philosophical, scientific, literary, artistic, and highly specialized topic with precision, depth, and eloquence.
Appreciation and understanding of etymology and semantic evolution of Armenian words.
Recognition, understanding, and appropriate use or interpretation of a wide range of regionalisms and sociolects within the Armenian-speaking world.
pronunciation_focus_topics: Native-like or indistinguishable-from-native pronunciation, intonation, stress, and rhythm across all registers and styles of Armenian.
Ability to subtly, effectively, and creatively vary prosody to convey complex attitudes, emotions, irony, humor, and other pragmatic meanings with native-like precision.
Effortless and natural handling of all aspects of connected speech, even at rapid native speed or with dialectal variations.
Ability to understand, analyze, and accurately reproduce or imitate various regional Armenian accents and sociolectal variations.
listening_comprehension_skills: Understand any kind of spoken Armenian, whether live or broadcast, even when delivered at fast native speed, with background noise, multiple speakers, or on unfamiliar/abstract topics.
Follow complex interactions between multiple speakers in any setting, identifying subtle cues, implicit meanings, and speaker intentions.
Appreciate stylistic nuances, register shifts, irony, humor, and implicit meaning in any spoken discourse.
reading_comprehension_skills: Understand and critically interpret all forms of written Armenian, including abstract, structurally or linguistically complex texts from various periods and genres.
Appreciate fine distinctions of style, tone, authorial intent, and literary or rhetorical devices.
Read and understand texts from different historical periods and diverse cultural contexts within the Armenian-speaking world.
spoken_interaction_skills: Take part effortlessly, fluently, and engagingly in any conversation or discussion, using idiomatic expressions and cultural references naturally and appropriately.
Express him/herself with precision, eloquence, and charisma, differentiating the finest shades of meaning, and reformulating ideas smoothly and effectively.
Argue a complex case, negotiate, persuade, and mediate effectively in any formal or informal setting, adapting strategies dynamically.
Adapt language and style appropriately and dynamically to any audience, context, and purpose with complete flexibility.
spoken_production_skills: Present a clear, smoothly-flowing, well-structured, and engaging description, argument, or narrative in an appropriate and compelling style on any complex subject.
Develop points cohesively, logically, and persuasively, with masterful use of organizational patterns and sophisticated cohesive devices.
Deliver presentations, lectures, or speeches with clarity, precision, eloquence, and engaging style, adapting to audience feedback and managing questions adeptly.
Use rhetorical devices effectively and creatively.
written_interaction_skills: Write any type of correspondence or document with complete command of style, tone, register, and persuasive techniques appropriate to the recipient and purpose.
Engage in complex written discussions or collaborations, conveying nuanced ideas effectively and persuasively.
written_production_skills: Write clear, smoothly-flowing, complex, and sophisticated texts (essays, research papers, reports, articles, reviews, creative writing) in an appropriate and effective style, demonstrating originality and critical insight.
Select and use a vast range of linguistic resources to express ideas precisely, persuasively, or artistically, with stylistic finesse.
Demonstrate mastery of organizational patterns, paragraphing, and cohesive devices to ensure clarity, coherence, and impact at a professional or academic level.
Write insightful summaries, critiques, or syntheses of complex information from multiple sources, adding original perspectives and critical analysis.
cultural_competence_topics: Profound, nuanced, and critical understanding of the diversity of Armenian culture, society, history, arts, literature, and intellectual traditions, including their evolution and global impact.
Ability to function with complete ease and cultural sensitivity in any Armenian-speaking environment.
Capacity to act as a cultural interpreter or mediator, explaining subtle and complex cultural nuances effectively.
Deep and critical understanding of contemporary socio-political issues, cultural debates, and intellectual currents in Armenia and the diaspora.
learning_strategies_suggestions: Maintain and expand language proficiency through continuous, high-level intellectual and creative engagement with diverse and complex authentic Armenian materials and interactions.
Engage in original scholarly research, critical analysis, or creative production in Armenian.
Contribute to Armenian-language publications, academic conferences, or professional activities at an expert level.
Reflect critically on and refine personal language use for optimal effectiveness, stylistic appropriateness, and creative expression.
Explore highly specialized areas of interest in great depth in Armenian, potentially contributing original research or creative work.
